issue.title: [CI][C++] Move AppVeyor MinGW builds to GitHub Actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7994](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7994). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To lighten a bit the load on AppVeyor (where we often have queues building up), it would be nice to move the MinGW builds to GitHub Actions.
